page.title: 02MARSH LANE DISABLED CENTRE.
page.content: The centre in {Marsh Lane,Ware}has been established for 12 years.At first it was run by the Herts. Association for the Disabled,as a workshop.It was taken over three years ago by {Hertfordshire Social Services.}The centre is for people aged from 17 years to retirement and its aim is to live as independently as possible and learn various skills including printing,painting,wrought iron work and gardening.They sell the things they make to raise money for the centre. Outings to pubs,parks,the seaside and other day centres are organised.Throughout the week the centre holds different activities such as yoga,tapestry and art classes.Some people stay for longer than others so they have more time to learn how to do things.
